Logic and ability to see forward is still required to complete the level.
Complete the levels in the number of moves allowed for each level, and share them on Facebook, especially if you manage to beat the minimum moves allowed.

description: Multiplayer, medieval archery. Numerous characters, and classes to choose from. Use a bow or crossbow to snipe at your enemies or throw an axe for high damage. Use a sword, axe, hammer, mace, or fists for close combat. Exact copies of real-world castles, including Topkapi Palace.

name: Light the Backrooms
description: You will be hounded by ghosts in the Backrooms of a ghost hunting company from midnight to 6 am. New kinds of crazy ghosts will be introduced daily, but you will also be notified how to deal with them. Take advantage of the two types of lights and survive five days of crazy business.

description: Rogue Blaster is a shooting game that adds a twist to the FPS genre by adapting some rogue-lite aspects. The planet you crash-landed on is teeming with monsters! Use different equipment and items to survive the attacks until your ship is ready to leave.

name: Green Sans
description: The first UNDERTALE fangame TO BE GOOD.

name: O-o-o
description:
The essential turning point strategy game!
Keep the board moving as you rotate discs to chain colors, connect corners and rack up high scores. Keep a level head under pressure as you clear as many lines as possible.
Earn perks to improve your chances, including Rewind giving you a second shot, Rainbow to chain with any color, and Bombs to clear out the board.
Combine perks and discover new tactics - drop a Rainbow and Rewind for better placement, or Rewind drop a Bomb? The choice is yours.
Thoughtfully designed with minimalist aesthetics and a rich ambient soundtrack, unwind while keeping your brain and body sharp.

name: Light the Way: 10th Anniversary
description:
Originally released in 2012, Light the Way saw favorable success and ratings before being taken down in 2015. Now, for it's tenth anniversary, the game has been rebuilt from the ground up, sporting a fresh coat of paint and a handful of QOL improvements!
Light the Way brings a twist to the classic memory game genre! A sequence of tiles will light up across the playing grid. It is your job to memorize which tiles light up and the order that they light up in, then recreate said sequence. Sounds easy, but as you reach higher difficulties, the playing grid becomes larger and the sequences longer, testing how effective your memory truly is!

name: Granny
description:
Many monsters and enemies in the city. Granny need to defeat them, this is a war, fight back and get treasures and save hostages.Earn more money to save town.Make granny become hero.
You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

name: Bubble Bobble 2 classic
description:
Bubblun, Bobblun, Kululun, Cororon have been cursed by Superdrunk after reading the sealed book then turned to bubble dragon and trapped in the world of the book.
It is an action game that selecting one of 4 character with different ability by shooting bubbles to trap the enemy, then pop it with horns or scales to defeat them.

You can play the game combining with other

name: Crush the Monsters: Cannon Game
description: Make mincemeat out of monsters! In this action puzzle game, you can destroy a variety of monsters in many different ways - blow them up with cannon fire, incinerate them, smash them, chop, saw or tear them to pieces (and that’s not nearly all!) And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!

name: Monthly Dystopia
description:
A dystopian survival experience inspired by George Orwell's 1984.
In Monthly Dystopia, you need to find a way to survive in an authoritarian world. You can serve the dictatorship by being a model citizen or you can try to flee the country by cooperating with the Resistance. You live under a regime in which love is forbidden and using words banned by the Party is punishable by death. Choose your words wisely if you don't want to commit a thought crime. Remember, there's always a screen watching you. The paycheck from your job at the ministry editing the past is barely enough to buy the food needed to keep you alive, so it is crucial that you find a way to flee this dystopia where even thinking is forbidden.
You can serve as a loyal citizen, fall in love and constantly fear getting caught, work with the Resistance against the dictatorship, and choose freedom or servitude.
The daily tasks you perform in your apartment are your only way to survive. Remember that your time is just as limited as your supplies. You'll have to choose between cooking before going to work, taking medication for your illness, or doing activities that benefit your mental state. You can try to protect the people around you by making conscientious decisions or you can escape this dystopia by sacrificing them.

name: Lillie is the Keeper
description:
You’ve always wanted a lighthouse of your very own.
Get up, find some open space, and step into a first-of-its-kind embodied AR experience.
The year is 1905. An uncanny catastrophe maroons Lillie Flora Pine in distant Switch Rock Light Station.
Where you go, Lillie goes - across the room, up the spiral stairs, or into the drink. Explore an atmospheric world between rolling seas and endless skies. Your iPhone or iPad is your controller. Examine objects. Operate machinery. Read logbooks. And try to ignore “Mrs. Noonday.”
Because Lillie is not an ordinary hero. Only 15, she suffers from intrusive thoughts. Now, they’re her only companion.
Because Lillie is the keeper.

name: Ram Setu: The Run
description:
Journey from one action packed situation to another, with star cast avatars inspired by the film Ram Setu, starring Akshay Kumar.
Ram Setu: Run - The Running game is a single and multiplayer non-stop action game. It’s a race in a quest to collect tokens, gems and power-ups, all while surviving the onslaught of enemy attacks, robotic drones, and wreckage.
Deal damage to enemies and escape the unpredictable as you ride, roll and jump, through this epic story deeply rooted in Indian culture and heritage.

name: Dracula City Master: Idle Army
description: Welcome to Dracula City Master - the ultimate idle horror tower defense game! Lead your own vampire army on a quest to conquer the world, expand your army with the tap of your finger and unleash hordes of hungry vampires into the world, with one goal - total domination!

name: PXL Play
description:
“PXL Play” is the first character you’ll meet in this adventurous endless runner. His happy bright color grabs your attention, and he’s hungry for pixel points. And more friends.
Continue your adventure with PXL, enjoying achievements and surprising boosts in this stress-free and colorful pixel world. The ability to shrink and grow, accelerate, earn more pixel points and expand your collection of playful characters is limitless.

name: Gallag
description:
Remember the game, Galaga?
This game is not what it used to be
but try to keep the memory of classic games.

Simple control and intuitive interface, etc.

name: Bearable - Return to Candyland
description: The Candyman and his tribe of merry elves have returned to the island of Bearadise, turning everyone - and everything into delicious treats! - Exclusive to the App Store

name: Angle Me
description:
The best free game ever to build your spatial, geometric, and tangram skills!
Fun and challenging for people of all ages!
Enjoy solving challenging puzzles by filling the board with a number of triangle shapes, fitting them together by form and colour.

name: Connect 4 Faces: Match & Play
description:
Connect 4 Faces is a fun modern version of the classic connect 4 game. It consists of two major parts:
1) A virtual world map as the matchmaking room: meet people from all around the world and find your perfect match. Exploring the match room is a lot of fun in itself. Fly around, collect some gems which you might need later in the game.
2) The actual connect 4 matches: To make this classic more exciting, you have limited time to complete your turn and you will loose health points if you missed it. Also, do not place your avatar offside, or you will loose more health points.
Be sure to delight your opponent player with some extra struggles. For instance you can create a game quake to make it difficult for him or her to exactly position his or her avatar. Or you can shorten the amount of time available for your opponent, shoot with baseballs, position turning windmills, hide your move or place a bomb to remove a threatening disc of your opponent. Some of the "attacks" (game quakes, time shortening) can even be defended.
After the match has finished you can send a message to your "opponent".
In the menu you can click "Recent Matches" - there you will find all matches you played in recent days. In this dialog you can "like" other players. That is, you can permanently see them in your "Liked Players" list and directly invite them to matches when they are online.
You can also check messages received form other players.
No game account needed. Just make sure that you have an iCloud account and that you have enabled iCloud Drive! No costs, no ads, no in-app purchases. Just fun playing. We hope you enjoy this game and we appreciate any feedback or thoughts you might have.

name: SailCraft GO
description:
Fully upgraded from the global feature winning "SailCraft," simulating the classic Battleship board game. Battle enemies under the fog of war, detect their position in advance, and eliminate their fleet at one stroke! SailCraft GO!
The all-age casual game that allows you to find new joy with families and friends. Classic Battleship and Attrition Battle modes. Match with players from all around the world anytime, anywhere. Intense and exciting PVP ladder league. Come find me at the Poseidon tier!
Brand new Sailing Road story mode and Siege Breakthrough instance. Challenge Sharkmen, Vikings, Skeleton Lord, Valkyries, Zeus, and other powerful bosses in legends and become the king of the seven seas!
Don’t want to play alone? The glory of the guild is calling you! Upgrade the Guild Frigate, compete in the Guild War, collect treasures in Exploration, conquer the sea with friends!
Please note! Downloading and installing "SailCraft GO" is free, while you can also purchase in-game items with real money. To cancel this feature, disable in-app purchases in Settings on your device.
In addition, this game requires an Internet connection.

name: Mahjong Lonely Island: Majong Star Tower Deluxe
description:
Mahjong - your task is to clear the board by removing a pair of identical tiles. This game is familiar to all, but not all are as interesting as this one! Here you will be able to go through many levels, that don’t seem to you very boring and simple. If you run out of moves, you can move all the tiles. Those who loves more beautiful color can change the background. There are also some tips.
Disassemble the pyramid and have a lot of fun!

Think you’ve seen it before? Think again! Tip the grid to start the balls rolling. Once tipped, stays tipped, until all balls are at rest. No dexterity required, just forward planning and logical thinking. Find the right sequence of tips to solve the puzzle.

description:
the objective of sudoku is to fill a 9 × 9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3 × 3 subgrids that compose the grid contain all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which for a well-posed puzzle has a single solution.
are you looking to solve some interesting sudoku look no more, enjoy solving exciting sudoku in a beautiful and relaxing environment where the Portal takes you to the highest pikes of sea cliffs and the coldest regions of the pole where Eskimos live build igloos, and rest their wooden sleds and the silent of desert canyon where you enjoy the base campfire and a full moon and wonderful waterfalls?

description:
Chess has evolved! Welcome to Beyond Chess, the sequel to chess! Move a piece, then shift a square. The board is now an active part of the game! It truly is the natural evolution of chess!
Take your chess skills to the next level and renew your passion, whether you’re a casual player or a grandmaster. Whatever your experience, Beyond Chess will be the most exciting and challenging game of chess you’ll ever play!
Build your own board design or choose from a growing library of 180+ designs! Then play friends or compete against players worldwide to see who is truly the greatest chess player in the world! Each board layout offers all new chess challenges to explore. Countless possibilities. Endless fun. It’s the universe of chess in your hands!

Tired of boring city simulators with monotonous gameplay? Econia is a mix of the best mechanics and genres: clicker, farm, idle, tycoon, city builder with resource crafting and quests!
Welcome to Econia: build the city of your dreams! This is a well-thought-out city business simulator for the construction and development of your metropolis. You can play alone or build huge cities together with other players - the choice of play style is up to you!
Use the most innovative economic strategies to become the market leader and overtake other players. Econia will surprise you and give you a unique gameplay that is definitely not found in other city sims, city simulators, idle, city tycoon games and clickers!
Econia: build the city of your dreams has everything you love in idle tycoon games: city building, economic and business simulator with a well-thought-out quest and trade system, farm mechanics and resource gathering.

name: Connectrode
description:
The game has no time limits - play at your own pace. Once you master the gameplay, try for a high score and discover new depths of challenge and strategy - and land a high score on the Game Center leaderboards.
The "boards" you play in Connectrode are randomly generated - you'll never run out of new challenges. Post your score on a board to Twitter or Facebook, and friends can use your link to play the very same board - they may even beat your score and send a challenge back to you!

name: Super Juicy HD
description: Super Juicy is bringing a new kind of action to the popular genre started by Bejeweled. The point is still to match like objects, but instead of jewels or parrots Super Juicy is all about the bubbles, baby. Moving bubbles that float, squeeze and grow in an ever-changing dance that kept me engaged for all 38 levels.

name: Frozen Slushy Maker
description: make fun frozen slushy maker

name: Dead People Driving HD
description:
That Corpse and His Friends Just Stole My Car!
Jump into this free underground street racing app where you will be racing with friends to escape the cops, but you will have to do it as zombies!
It's your corpse, your buddies versus the cops!

name: Super Balloon Rush
description:
Take the coolest journey ever from the creators of the #1 smash hit THE IMPOSSIBLE TEST series with over 25,000,000 downloads!
Join Toby's adventure as he pops balloons using awesome weapons! Use a remote control tank, baseballs, fireworks, magic wand, ninja stars, ray gun and other juicy weapons to give Toby a fighting chance against all the balloons!

name: Tiny Sheep: Pet Sim on a Farm
description:
One day as you were strolling in a beautiful meadow you spot a fluffy white object descending from the clouds.
As you get closer you realize it is a tiny white sheep! You stood flabbergasted as you watch it floating down.
You walk towards the sheep, it looks at you with big, adorable sheep eyes.
What should you do with this fluffy white sheep?
Surely, this must be a sign from the heavens that you should become a sheep farmer...

name: Bonzai Bounce
description: Bonzai Bounce is a 2D platformer with a unique graphical style. Your mission is to control the ball and collect orbs that are spread throughout the 6 levels. Clear the levels as fast as you can with as many orbs as possible to get the highest possible score. At your disposal is the environment, use bridges as slingshots and platforms to reach new heights.

name: TrumpGate
description:
Tap to make Trump jump and avoid falling off the grid.
Collect as many recordings you can to avoid being impeached and get as higher score as possible.
Recordings can be used to unlock more Trumps to use in game.

name: Hit the Pillar
description: Hit the pillars and score as many points as possible! How far can you go?

name: CCG Deck Adventures Wild Arena
description:
Collect awesome Cards, Build your Battle Deck and enter the Wild Arena for epic card wars! Forget turn-based, go realtime against player constructed decks (PvP simulation)!
In this intuitive and beautiful trading card game (TCG), you’ll be unleashing powerful cards with special abilities in minutes. Battle fast & accessible real-time fierce card wars, battle duels on the go with spectacular fantasy magic spells and effects for the cards. Will you win your battles and become one of the deck heroes of the world?
Enter the exciting card deck adventure journey with awesome graphics and tactical gameplay, find the best tactics and strategies to defeat opponents through multiple arenas in the order and chaos ahead all the way to the top. Whether this is your first card exchange game or you are an experienced pro, join the community and the depth and charm of this Wild Arena adventure will draw you in. The savage animal magic fantasy theme makes is very intuitive right from the start.
Finally an EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER Trading Card Game (TCG)! If you never played a TCG/CCG before, you’ll finally understand that collectible card games can be insanely fun! But warning: this will be your #1 game for the upcoming years! Will you become one of the deck heroes, in this order and chaos building the best ccg / tcg deck in the animal kingdom there is?

name: Arabian Princess: Dress Princess Match 3
description:
Arabian Princess: Dress Princess Match 3
The Arabian Desert is full of mysterious treasures that are yours for the taking.
Uncover the mysteries of the Arabia, legend by legend. Match 3 tiles in a row to remove them from the grid. Collect special objects by removing the tiles beneath and letting them fall to the bottom. Clear all the special objects to finish the level, then claim your riches!
Swap to match 3 or more tiles in a row.Eject all items from the bottom of the plahying field to complete each level.
Match three or more tiles to reveal the picture hidden behind the game field.

name: Norm of the North's Digit Dodge
description:
The Lemmings aren't just Norm's indestructible A-team, they’re also math whizzes! So...when Norm can't get any of the answers right, the Lemmings (like all the other animals in Norm’s life) have a whale of a time teasing him. Well, Norm's not having any of that!
Join Norm and the Lemmings for no-holds-barred, mathematical winter warfare! Pick a side and answer math questions correctly to launch snowballs at the enemy. Solve them quickly, though. If you don't, then you’ll be the one who gets pelted with snowballs and put on ice!

name: Trigger on the Road
description:
The game that drew over 5million game players world widely! And now the adventure series “Trigger-on the road!! Is out!
Trigger-on the road provides new types of adventure driving game to everyone.
The game player drives through spectacle stages and escapes from unexpected obstacles to discover “Golden Key”.
All the exciting themes and adventures are waiting for you!

name: Freak Run
description: Freak Run is an online multiplayer running game that you can enjoy with other players around the world. Compete with randomly selected players to run the race faster.

name: Little Boat River Rush
description: Start the journey of a lifetime on a high-speed river ride into the world of eternal summer. Feel the power of water, hop into your boat and get ready for a breathtaking adventure. Learn cool stunts, flush out birds, maneuver through obstacles and merge with nature. Join the championship, set new records and taste the victory.

name: Driving Speed HD
description:
Race in high powered V8 muscle cars from classic era to modern day. Highly realistic physics, audio, car handling and performance set this game apart.
Compete in career mode where you can experience a real racing career. Start off with a small amount of money to purchase a car and enter into organized series events. Winnings from the races will allow purchase of more cars, repairs and performance upgrades. Build your way up to compete in elite series events.
Modify your car by purchasing upgrades for performance and see exactly how each type of upgrade specifically improves the power and torque of the engine on a dyno chart. Purchase upgraded transmissions for faster gear shifts. Purchase better tyres for increased grip and road handling. Purchase weight reduction for better handling. Purchase suspension setups that lower the car and improve the handling from a lower center of gravity.

name: Endless Jump: Infinity Loop
description:
Can play at any time, 1 minute spare time is enough.
Simple game rule, control the ball jump across the columns. Keep it jump forever.
It is very hard, anything go wrong will be game over. You hard to keep play over 1 minute.
You can think this game is 1 minute challenge.

name: BMX Champions Cartoon Network
description:
Ride your bike through fun-packed tracks with jumps and loops in this simple and fast-paced head-to-head biking rampage racing game. Whether you are into stunts, one-wheeling, dirt biking, stoppies, or speed thrills, BMX Champions will have you displaying your best skills while you manoeuvre your way through the obstacle course mayhem! Play as your favourite Cartoon Network character and jump on your customised bicycle ride and line up against other Cartoon Network characters. You meet several characters during the game, most of whom you can visit as often as you like. You can ask these characters about any item of evidence or information that you've collected along the way.
The aim (and name) of the game is to spot contradictions in what they've said. By consulting your notes and pairing together two contradictory replies, Jenks will interrogate the character and they will be forced to reveal new information, allowing you to progress further through the game.

In this numbers game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be merged, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can combine numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two digits have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the number board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out number blocks between them.
If you cannot or do not want to merge numbers, and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the numbers game continues.
Number Match Game Numberama 2

name: Ancient Games Of Nations: The Royal Game Of Ur
description:
The Royal Game of Ur is a 5000-year old Mesopotamian strategy board game which is wonderfully easy to learn. Download free for iPad the high-quality reconstruction of a game board from 2600 B.C., found in the Royal Tombs of Ur (Mesopotamia). You can play in single- or local two-player mode on a single device, at the difficulty level of your choice from beginner to advanced. This is the first piece in the AGON – Ancient Games of Nations series, a collection of amazing traditional board games for iPad.
About the history of The Royal Game of Ur:
In the 1920s, British Museum’s archaeologist Sir Leonard Wooley (1880-1960) found two of these game boards in the city of Ur. There is evidence that The Royal Game of Ur was the most popular game of the era. It is a typical race game, the ancestor of the genre. The rules applied in this iPad reconstruction are based on a cuneiform tablet from the 2nd century.
The framework application that comes with AGON - Ancient Games Of Nations is a virtual box which has twelve compartments to accommodate further board games. These will be made available one by one by Private Moon Studios. All AGON board games purchased will automatically integrate in the collection. The series will include various game types from all over the world: ancient Mesopotamia, Egypt, Japan, Korea and many more.

name: Cribbage Live
description:
Play cribbage and chat online with real players - hundreds of players from all over the world at all hours!
High quality and easy-to-use cribbage board, cards and fast play.
Cribbage Live is a social gaming platform where cribbage players from all corners of the planet come together to play this popular board game.
Cribbage Live features one-on-one cribbage games, multiplayer cribbage tournaments and multiple game variations.
Cribbage Live supports tournaments from both GameColony.com and cribbage.org ACC (American Cribbage Congress)
If you had an internet disconnection, Cribbage Live will reconnect you. Cribbage Live will play fine with either WIFI or 3G connection.
Six Card Cribbage is a two-player game of skill that uses a standard 52 card pack. The goal is to be the first to score 121 points over several deals. Points are scored for card combinations that occur during the play or in a player's hand or in the crib -- the cards discarded before the play.
Five Card Cribbage variation is an older traditional version that is still popular in England. 5 card Cribbage differs from the more modern 6 card cribbage by the number of cards in hand (initially 5) and by the score to play - usually it is played to 61 points.
Paul Rice of Wells, ME who plays in US national cribbage tournaments says that in cribbage "75 percent or more" depends on the skill of the player. Per Paul Rice: "in cribbage, every card you play and every card your opponent plays, you're trying to throw a curve ball in there"... "you can be dealt a gosh-awful hand and if you play it right, you can advance up the board."
Cribbage Live uses a fast cribbage central server supporting different cribbage clients in addition to iOS-based cribbage client.

4 Game modes: Classic Grab, Timed Grab, Money Stash & Fast Cash.

name: WhatsSlot Halloween
description: Slot Diamond Season for Halloween!!

name: Flashloft's Slots
description:
Slots is the perfect Las Vegas style slot machine experience for your mobile phone.
Beautifully themed Slots, ! Fun themes including: Burger Max, Crazy book store, Go Go Train, Fruit joy, Ghost Link Line, X'mas gifts, and More!
Flashloft's Slots is free! Choose your adventure, your bets and your lines and play as long as your heart desires!

name: Millionaire Show
description:
A show that the whole world enjoys, where a dream of becoming a millionaire comes true, is hosted every year.
In order to become a millionaire, they must play a game with danger.
If they win the game, they get to turn their lives around in a second.
Many people participate in the show. They either become a millionaire or are disabled for life.
You, living a normal life, decide to participate in this millionaire show to have a chance at turning your life around.
Will you be able to become a millionaire?

name: Adventure Slots HD: Titan's of Las Vegas Fortune Casino
description:
“One of the best slot games I’ve ever played”. Jump into Casino Adventure with this exciting multi-line slot game. Spin the bonus wheel to win big fortune! This virtual video slot game gives you that Las Vegas feeling without losing you real money. Feeling lucky?
You’ll enjoy many perks while playing this exciting game: for your entertainment you will get access to 6 machine themes: Greek Gold, Amazon Queen, Jurassic Jackpot, Queen of the Nile, World War and, Pirate Slots.
With multiple levels, bonus games, hourly bonuses, and loads of machines, this is the slot game for you!

name: Mine Blast!
description: Blast the mine around the screen to reach the goal. Try and get the mine to the goal in as few explosions as possible!

name: Angel Archer Run: The Lost Temple of Oz
description: Not all angels are nice! Some are naughty, and this one is seeking adventure! Run, jump fly and shoot your way to the lost temple. Will you make it there alive?

name: Bivoj
description: Originally designed 2D and 2.5D mobile game. As Bivoj, you must save the beautiful Kazi from the bloodthirsty pigs. A difficult journey full of various tasks and traps inspired by an old legend. Will you accept this request? :)

name: QuizPig
description:
QuizPig is a 100% free (no ads, no in-app purchases) general knowledge quiz game covering 5 main categories: General Knowledge, Geography & Cultures, Entertainment & Sport, History & Politics and Science & Nature.
Get questions right to earn stars and unlock more quizzes.
Be prepared for a challenge though, as some of these questions are seriously tricky!
At launch we have over 300 questions, and more are on the way in an update very soon.

name: Where is Ploppy?
description: Where is Ploppy?, a colorful fun hidden object game for everyone, is designed with your child's safety in mind. In addition to Apple's guidelines for children's games, we go one step further and firmly believe that any data about your children belongs exclusively to you and your children and should stay that way. Therefore, Where is Ploppy? does not store any of your children's data! There are additional security mechanisms in place to prevent your child from being routed out of the app while playing. This means that as soon as a link is called up, such as to rate the game, a short math problem must be solved beforehand. Furthermore, the game is also designed for the colorblind and children who can't read yet.

name: Catchy Chips
description:
Chips are falling from the sky! Catch them all to fill up the packets. Sounds easy? You wish! Avoid collecting the burnt chips or it’s game over!
Play through the levels and collect all the stars or play classic mode and set a new high score! You can play offline too!

name: Jacky's Hidden Items
description:
"Jacky's Hidden Items" is a unique search and find hidden objects game featuring the drawings of the ingenious artist Jacky Jackson in a new interactive hidden objects puzzle experience.
Jacky's drawings are colored black and white with a rare style and humor, each hiding an object, animal or a person which seems to be part of the drawing... but it isn't! Challenge your illusionary brain to see if you can find all the hidden objects on each level.
The game is nothing like the classic "hidden object" games that you already know - download to discover special gameplay, story, art, and design which makes it a truly unique and original brain teasers puzzle game unlike any other.
The game's concept is simple and lovely and suits all ages - from kids to adults alike. But don’t let this fool you, “Jacky’s Hidden Items“ will require you to solve challenging mind teasing levels in a clever and rewarding experience as you’ve never encountered before.

name: Jello Bubbles: Pop Color Balls
description:
Play the new fun and addictive Jello Bubbles shooter game for FREE. Enjoy solving original bubble puzzles and relax popping colorful jelly balls.
Match 3 or more bubbles with the same color and clear levels, accomplish the game objective to advance to the next one.
Aim & shoot with the Jell-O-Matic Machine, to drop & blast all bubbles. A funny hummingbird helps you with nice boosters. Tap on the screen and drag the mini bubbles aim and lift it to shot. Take your time to aim and hit your desired bubble to make it pop.
Easy to learn, only aim, match, and pop all the balls in this fun color-matching adventure. Use your puzzle-solving skills to clear levels and unlock new cities around the world. Travel with our heroine and discover amazing monuments, from Barcelona to the world. Clean the Jello and save the kidnapped birds.

name: Garbage Truck City Tycoon
description:
"Let’s clean the world together! Join EMKA - waste disposal company, on their quest to save our planet from getting covered in trash. Welcome to Garbage Truck City Tycoon. In this game you as a player take control of a recycling ECO truck, equipped with special vacuums that harvest garbage. By cleaning the environment you can invest in new trucks, upgrades and green technologies that will improve your gameplay. The main goal of this game is to highlight the importance of ecology. Various environments starting from forests, cities and deserts you will encounter in the game will show you how garbage crisis affects the environment. Features:
Buy and upgrade trucks, for better performance
Collect special boosters with various effects
Unlock legendary trucks
Construct and upgrade structures of garbage processing
Expand your business
Dozens of levels with various environments to unlock
Help us clean the world together with EMKA!"

name: Train Simulator PRO USA
description:
Tracks. Diesel. Railroad. Huge Map of the USA. Train Cars. Coal, Tractor or even Tank Freight. Authentic Stations. Realistic Locomotives. Picturesque Scenery. Passenger Wagons. Railway Turntable. Air Brakes. Long Haul. Open World. FREE. With lots of Air Hissing and Steam. The list goes on and on. Don’t hesitate no more - just download now!
Train Simulator PRO USA gives you all you could imagine from a realistic train simulator. Jump into the driver's cabin, use coupling to attach your railway trucks and drive your goods to make the highest profit.
With tons of challenges to complete, over dozen different railcars and cargo types, numerous realistic cities and stations to unlock and explore and above all beautiful scenery of the United States of America which you can discover through the windows of the most iconic passenger and freight locomotives this game is a must for every simulator fan out there.
Download and become a railway tycoon now!

name: Olly's San Francisco Rush
description: Rush through the streets of San Francisco!

name: Cracké Rush Endless Run & Fun
description:
RUN as fast as you can to catch your precious eggs!
Turn yourself into Ed and play Cracké Rush, a free, easy-to-play, high-speed endless runner with zany antics and addictive gameplay mechanics for the whole family!

A very anxious and overprotective dad ostrich, Ed will do anything to keep his adorable eggs safe. But these rollicking eggs just want to go on an adventure and have fun exploring the world. It’s time to join Ed and stretch the limits of what it means to be a GREAT parent in his endless crazy running quest to take care of those precious eggs!
Cracké Rush is a casual run and fun game that will make you cry with joy!
Play this egg-citing new runner game for free now and save your eggs!

name: Scream Timbernote:the game of voice controller
description:
Timbernote is a voice control and magic games.Support bluetooth wifi close range multiplayer, support single player, support scream play, support classic play.
Just 50 decibels to the microphone, you can switch it left or right, without sound, without any switch,and tap to chopping!
Timbernote is an oldschool arcade style casual game. Become a Timbernote, chop wood by tapping and avoid the branches by screaming. Sounds like an easy task? It's easy to play but hard to master. Master your skills for the top records on the leaderboards.
Take your axe as every lumberjack does and chop the tree as fast as you can!

name: Traffic Race 3D: Highway
description:
Burn the rubber. Show your skills.
The ultimate highway traffic race with addictive gameplay, Superb 3D graphics and varying terrains.
Play a quick highway race and enjoy your spare time. Shift gears and move very fast upto 300 Km/ph and evade crashing into moving traffic on highway.
Be the new speed star on the street, race as far as you can go and bend the rules.
Crash your car, rise from the dust and try another race. It just keeps pushing you for more.

name: BraveNine Story
description:
An extraordinary adventure story of the unstoppable mercenary group!
Brave Nine mercenaries are back in a new Visual Novel RPG, BraveNine Story!
Why did this young noble man from a prestigious family become a runaway overnight?

name: Ski Challenge
description:
Feel the excitement and thrill of ski racing on your mobile devices whenever and wherever you are with Ski Challenge 365 days a year!
Race down popular, real-world-inspired and fictional ski tracks against the timer or compete against your friends. Only the fastest win!

name: Metarails
description: All train collectors, strategy players, and tycoon enthusiasts sit up! Metarails merges the best from classic tycoon games with the train collecting element, and brings it to mobile devices! The complex Metarails tabletop maps, copying real North American areas, are built to give you a relaxing yet immersive gaming experience. You can collect dozens of unique high-quality locomotives, and a variety of trains, and expand your train empire across a single-player campaign.

name: StackLands2
description: Stacklands is a village builder where you stack cards to collect food, build structures, and fight creatures. For example, dragging a Villager card on top of a Berry Bush card will spawn Berry cards which the villagers can eat to survive. Play your cards right and expand your village!

name: Legend Magician
description:
Immersive RPG with dot-pixel 2D graphics and auto-play
I’m a god? I thought I was just a fox monster!
Your journey to becoming a true god begins!
An Idle system which allows you to become stronger without accessing the game!
Auto level-ups! Use your own gear and skills to automatically fight the endless waves of monsters and develop your heroes!

name: Trial of Dragon
description: This is a pixel style classic turn based strategy (SLG) game. You need to form a multi-class team to adventure. With the Roguelike each game map is random, challenging different enemies, defeating the powerful Boss, obtaining various props and equipment, and upgrading heroes of each class.

name: Pocket GM 3: Football Manager
description: Following the success of Pocket GM 2021, it's time to manage your very own American Football franchise once again!

name: Pixel Race: Endless Retro Racing
description:
Pixel Race is an endless racing game which you earn badges, unlock and
upgrade cars while trying to win the Legendary badge.
4 CARS
Each new car is smaller and stronger than previous one!

name: Vivid Relapse
description: Sin descripción

description: Void Rogue is a Shoot Em' Up Platformer for Game Jolt Contest 9. Controls are found in the game itself. The game features fully procedural level generation, and three unique enemies to fight.

name: Lord of Chaos
description:
You are an entity of disorder. The flow of time neither concerns nor binds you; you traverse worlds at your leisure, and you exist for only one purpose...To destroy!!!
You are the Lord of Chaos, a being that feeds on destruction, death, and rivers of blood! This is but a glimpse into the existence of the Lord of Chaos, as he appears on the site of a medieval field of battle, to lay waste to either side of the conflict.
The question is...how much destruction can you bring before the Lord gets bored, and moves on?

name: Welcome Home Jacob
description: "Welcome Home Jacob" is a dark and unnerving experience targeted at mature audiences. It was made in under 72 hours for the Meatly Jam.

name: The Path
description: Sin descripción

name: Sheltered Deep
description: Sheltered Deep is a psychological horror game about desperation, cruelty and thin lines between right and wrong. Will your choices be your salvation, or will they doom your soul for eternity?

name: Innoquous 4
description: The fourth in the series of gravity-flipping platformer games, Innoquous 4 is over four times the size of its predecessor! 75 levels with five distinct game modes.
